get.description: Basic healthcheck
Basic healthcheck that requires authentication
Return basic info about deployment

post.description: Report a heartbeat for a VM

Report that a VM is dead, so that it is removed immediately.

This can be useful when you need the live list to update faster than the timeout.

get.description: Return a list of the active VMs

schema.title: Response List Live Vms Vm Live Get

get.description:
Get cpu metrics for certain VMs between from_ts to to_ts, inclusive.
:param vm_ids: A list of VM ids to get metrics for. Empty list returns no results (but not an error).
:param from_ts: Start time filter, inclusive. Optional.
:param to_ts: End time filter, inclusive. Optional. If to_ts is before from_ts, there will not be an
              error, but the results will be empty.
:return: List of CpuMeasurement objects

schema.title: Response Get Cpu Metrics Metrics Cpu Get

post.description: Put a cpu metric measurement into the datastore

get.description: Get the most recent cpu measurements for each VM

schema.title: Response Get Latest Cpu Metrics Metrics Cpu Latest Get

VmRegistrationInfo.title: VmRegistrationInfo
VmRegistrationInfo.description:
Information about a VM to register with the control plane.

Same as VM heartbeat, but without a few fields that are either set via URL params or
automatically set server-side.
